snippet.title: Heavenly Bodies - Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Heavenly Bodies will be coming to PC, PS5 and PS4 on December 7th, 2021!

Wrangle the hands and arms of a weightless cosmonaut and clamber your way through a collection of precarious stellar scenarios where, without gravity, nothing is still, nothing is secure and nothing is ever simple.

Wishlist on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1138850/Heavenly_Bodies/

Or come say hey on Twitter: https://twitter.com/2ptStudio
